summary: In 1864, mercenary Clyde MacKay leads a squad of hard-case cutthroats on a mission for the Confederate high command: infiltrate an enemy fortress and steal a million dollars in gold from the Union Army.
cast: Chuck Connors|Frank Wolff|Franco Citti|Leo Anchóriz|Giovanni Cianfriglia|Alberto Dell'Acqua|Hércules Cortés|Antonio Molino Rojo|Furio Meniconi|Alfonso Rojas|Ugo Adinolfi|John Bartha|Nestore Cavaricci|Sergio Citti|Vincenzo Maggio|Osiride Pevarello|Pietro Torrisi
title: Mátalos y vuelve
